s.text: Well, one hesitates to say with certainty that this particular president ever learns from experience on this particular subject, but surely, surely , at this point ...
But that doesn't mean our long national nightmare is over.
In the past year, our former-peacenik president has launched missile attacks on Osama bin Laden and Saddam Hussein at the oddest of times.
In the past year, our former-peacenik president has launched missile attacks on Osama bin Laden and Saddam Hussein at the oddest of times.
In the past year, our former-peacenik president has launched missile attacks on Osama bin Laden and Saddam Hussein at the oddest of times.
Clinton can save Social Security, protect the environment, improve public schooling, and help elect Al Gore but, at the end of the day, the problem hasn't gone away.
But let's face it: It fits a pattern.
